text: A ticket for a 1993 game between the Philadelphia Phillies and the Chicago Cubs. The 1993 Chicago Cubs season was the 122nd season of the Chicago Cubs franchise, the 118th in the National League and the 78th at Wrigley Field. The Cubs finished fourth in the National League East with a record of 84–78. ==Offseason== *December 2, 1992: Steve Lake was signed as a Free Agent with the Chicago Cubs.Steve Lake Statistics Baseball-Reference.com *December 8, 1992: Dan Plesac was signed as a Free Agent with the Chicago Cubs.https://www.baseball-reference.com/p/plesada01.shtml *December 9, 1992: Randy Myers signed as a Free Agent with the Chicago Cubs.Randy Myers Statistics Baseball-Reference.com *December 18, 1992: Willie Wilson was signed as a Free Agent with the Chicago Cubs.Willie Wilson Statistics Baseball- Reference.com *February 8, 1993: Steve Lyons was signed as a Free Agent with the Chicago Cubs.Steve Lyons Statistics Baseball-Reference.com *March 28, 1993: Steve Lyons was released by the Chicago Cubs. ==Regular season== ===Season standings=== ===Record vs. opponents=== ===Notable Transactions=== *June 1, 1993: Heathcliff Slocumb was traded by the Chicago Cubs to the Cleveland Indians for Jose Hernandez.Heathcliff Slocumb Statistics Baseball- Reference.com *June 3, 1993: Brooks Kieschnick was drafted by the Chicago Cubs in the 1st round (10th pick) of the 1993 amateur draft. Player signed July 22, 1993.https://www.baseball-reference.com/k/kiescbr01.shtml *June 3, 1993: Steve Rain was drafted by the Chicago Cubs in the 11th round of the 1993 amateur draft. Player signed July 5, 1993.https://www.baseball- reference.com/players/r/rainst01.shtml *July 30, 1993: Karl Rhodes was traded as part of a 3-team trade by the Kansas City Royals to the Chicago Cubs. The New York Yankees sent John Habyan to the Kansas City Royals. The Chicago Cubs sent Paul Assenmacher to the New York Yankees.https://www.baseball- reference.com/r/rhodeka01.shtml *August 19, 1993: Glenallen Hill was traded by the Cleveland Indians to the Chicago Cubs for Candy Maldonado.Glenallen Hill Statistics Baseball-Reference.com ===Roster=== {| class="toccolours" style="font-size: 95%;" |- !
